markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Suli Amir](/Feats.aspx?ID=2590) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Suli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=310" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 111 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs. You can cast [_read omens_](/Spells.aspx?ID=247) and 4th-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) each once per day as arcane innate spells, and you can cast [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) at will as an arcane innate cantrip, heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Suli Amir
